name: EVE (Poppy0511)
description:
Type: Decryption and Strategy RPG

Eve was sent to prison on charges of murdering the Rat senator. Who was behind the muder? What's the truth behind? 

Help Eve get out of the jail before the date of  execution. And try to restore the real story in the prison. Don't miss any important information, and be careful not to get caught by the guards. 

Team:

Zihan Cao (Poppy)-Producer

Jiaji Lu-Narrative designer 

Meijing Xie- Art Designer

Zihan Liu (Edison)- Interactive Designer

Yudong Guo - Environment Designer 

Yuxing Liu - Animation Designer 

Game Play:

Try to get out of jail in 5 Days (Collect clues, Interact with NPCs, Explore rooms, Discover the secret of the prison.......)
